Package com.cdd.lab6

Class Buffer

java.lang.Object
com.cdd.lab6.Buffer
public class Buffer extends Object
A buffer class containing an array of integers and the semaphores necessary to synchronise access to the buffer by Producer/threads.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private static int[]
    buffer
    The array that will hold the buffer values.
    private static int
    count
    A count variable to keep track of the number of elements in the buffer.
    static Semaphore
    items
    Used to control consumer's access to items on the buffer.
    static Semaphore
    mutex
    A semaphore that will be used as a mutex lock to synchronise read/writes.
    static Semaphore
    spaces
    Tracks the number of available spaces in the fixed-size buffer.

  • Constructor Details

    • Buffer

      Buffer(int bufferSize)
      The main constructor method.
      Parameters:
      bufferSize - The maximum number of elements that should fit in the buffer.

  • Method Details

    • push

      public void push(int val)
      This method will be used by Producer threads to push data onto the buffer. Checks if there are available spaces on the buffer via the spaces semaphore. If so, the new value is added to the buffer and the count is incremented. items is released to signal that an item is available for consumption by a Consumer.
      Parameters:
      val - The value of the produced data to push onto the buffer.

    • pop

      public int pop()
      This method will be used by Consumer threads to get data from the buffer to consume. Checks if there are items available for consumption on the buffer. If so, the data is retrieved and removed from the buffer. spaces is released to signal that a space is again available for a Producer to write data.
      Returns:
      The value to be returned to the Consumer thread for consumption.
